title: Dan Roper – 2021 Comments on the Behaviour of Emma Hodds
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Dan Roper, the Leader of the Liberal Democrat Group on Broadland District Council, on 14 September 2021.
content:
It is a shame that an event to celebrate some of the fantastic work and dedication of our staff through the pandemic was overshadowed by this. It would not have looked out of place as a scene in The Office. The language used was wholly inappropriate.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
